Grand Master Oltran:
I represent the Dark Elves. I was instructed to impart new vigor those who deserve to adopt a new fate. And you just come up with these requirements.
We, the Dark Elves, were in a very difficult situation. We need people like you to get back to the Goddess of Destruction, facing away from us. If you are ready to get a new power and regain the honor of our race, I'll give you a job.
"Listen..."
